Read Gene List and Perform Enrichment

readGeneList.Rd

Reads a gene list, optionally splits by regulation, and performs enrichment analysis.

Usage

readGeneList(
  listpathSig,
  name,
  category,
  background = NULL,
  split_by_reg = FALSE,
  logFC_threshold = 0,
  pval_threshold = 0.05,
  n = 10,
  min_genes_threshold = 3
)

Arguments

listpathSig

A data frame containing the gene list with columns genes and optionally log2fold.

name

The name of the condition (used in results).

category

The enrichment database to use.

background

A background list of genes to use with enrichR. See enrichr documentation for details.

split_by_reg

Logical. If TRUE, splits genes by up- and down-regulation.

logFC_threshold

The threshold for determining up/down-regulation. Defaults to 0.

pval_threshold

The adjusted p-value threshold for filtering results.

n

The number of top terms to return. Default is 10.

min_genes_threshold

The minimum number of genes required for a term to be kept in the results. Default is 3.

Value

A list with two data frames: regular (all terms) and top (top terms).
